title: Here's the date when women will 'stop being paid' in 2019 - no change there then
text:
Yesterday, I was one of many women who walked at Samira Ahmed’s side as she arrived at her employment tribunal to bring her equal pay claim against the BBC. Her case against the broadcaster is not the first, and it most certainly won’t be the last. They are also under investigation from the Equality and Human Rights Commission (EHRC) for pay discrimination.

But as we at the Fawcett Society know from our own equal pay advice service - which was made possible thanks to Carrie Gracie’s donation of her BBC pay out - it is just one of many employers who apparently fail to pay women equally for doing equal work.

In the past few months we have seen a multi-million pound pay out to thousands of Glasgow...
